snippet.title: Fix This House - Find Peace in Every Fix
snippet.description:
Fix This House - It is a relaxing puzzle game where the player has to assemble a building, with an emphasis on physics simulation with appropriate sounds and different seasons (summer☀️, winter❄️ and so on). The game also features various fun interactive elements, such as bendable trees🌴, hydrants, poles, snowmen☃️, yacht ⛵

Developed with love❤️ by indie dev👨‍💻

Play Demo & Wishlist on Steam 🔥
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2996860/Fix_This_House/
